comment:
Full, round malt character without being cloyingly sweet. Hop balance is killer. Started as an IPA recipe, presented as a hoppy amber ale. Very pleasantly surprised.
Lightly fruity ester profile (apple-y, light pear) plays very well with classically resinous American hop profile. They combine to make something like a light mango or pineapple flavor. Not at all unpleasant. Definitely worth a rebrew with more bittering hops.
